dict.acceptation: 得分，得分记录；[乐]总谱，乐谱；计算，百分数，成份；论点，理由，缘故，根据；
记分；刻痕；勾引，成功地用性勾引某人；走私；
记下（欠账）；评分；分值是；牢记…的宿怨；

sent.orig: Larger non-uniform formats of the emblem can be purchased from Scout Resources International (SCORE).
sent.trans: 大的非制服式的徽章可经由国际童军资源(ScoutResourcesInternational(SCORE))购得。

sent.orig: SBA offers free counseling through its Small Business Development Centers and its affiliate, SCORE.
sent.trans: 小企业协会(SBA)通过其小企业发展中心(SmallBusinessDevelopmentCenters)及其附属机构SCORE向创业人员提供免费的咨询服务。

sent.orig: Creation of Scout Resources International (SCORE) , the official Scout Shop of the World Organization.
sent.trans: 成立国际童军资源单位(SCORE)，为世界童军总会旗下的官方童军供应中心。

sent.orig: Clinical neurological function wad assessed with combined behavioral score (CBS).
sent.trans: 应用联合行为评分(Combined behavioral score, CBS)评价脊髓神经运动功能。

sent.orig: Clinical neurological function was assessed with combined behavioral score (CBS).
sent.trans: 运用联合行为评分(Combined Behavioral Score,CBS)，评价脊髓运动功能。
